put.summary:
Creates or Updates an existing ServicesHub Connector
This links to Services Hub and Log Analytics workspace

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

200.description: The Services Hub Connector has been created or updated successfully.

201.description: The Services Hub Connector has been created successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the properties of a Services Hub Connector.

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

200.description: The Services Hub Connector has been updated successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary:
Gets an existing ServicesHub Connector
It also gets details of associated Services Hub and Log Analytics workspace

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

204.description: The Services Hub connector is not found or has been deleted already.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets the Entitlement for the Services Hub Workspace.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of the operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Azure ServicesHub Connectors under the specified resource group.

200.description: The Azure ServicesHubConnectors have been fetched successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Azure ServicesHub Connectors under the specified Azure subscription.

200.description: The Azure ServicesHubConnectors have been fetched successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get the Entitlement of the user.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets the list Services Hub Workspaces user is part of.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets an existing ServicesHub Recommendation Content details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets the Assessment Config Settings data from Ops Center for the  Services Hub Workspace.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Triggers the Enable Solution Azure Function for the  Services Hub Workspace and linked Log analytics workspace.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: services hub enable solution payload object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Gets the ServicesHub AMA SolutionStatus from AzureFunction for the Log Analytics workspace.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: services hub get ama status payload object

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get all the spaces for the logged-in user corresponding to the user's EngageHub 1PA token.

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Create or Update Assessment Connector information linked with EngageHub Spaces'.

parameters.name: x-ms-engage-hub-token
parameters.description: EngageHub 1PA token to be send to EH Gateway

200.description: The Assessment Connector has been created or updated successfully.

201.description: The Assessment Connector has been created successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ServicesHubConnectorProperties.description: Custom properties of a Services Hub Workspace.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of Services Hub Connector.

servicesHubWorkspaceId.description: Unique identifier of Services Hub Workspace.

servicesHubWorkspaceName.description: Name of the Services Hub Workspace.

assessmentCount.description: Count of Assessments mapped to the Connector resource.

consentedAzureSubscription.description: Has Consent Been Provided for the Azure Subscription

LogAnalyticsWorkspace.description: Properties of the Linked Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

workspaceId.description: ID of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

workspaceName.description: Name of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

location.description: Region where the Azure Log Analytics Workspace is deployed.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID in which Azure Log Analytics Workspace is present.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID where the Azure Log Analytics Workspace is present.

resourceGroupName.description: Resource Group Name of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

ServicesHubConnectorListResult.description: Result of a request to list all Azure Services Hub Connector under a given scope.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of Services Hub connectors, if there are any.

SupportOfferingEntitlement.description: Defines the type of customer - Unified or Premier

CustomerType.description: Type of customer - Premier or Unified.

AssessmentEntitlement.description: Defines the type of customer - Unified or Premier and the services they are entitled to

customerType.description: Type of customer - Premier or Unified.

ServicesHubWorkspaceListResult.description: Result of a request to list all Azure Services Hub Connector under a given scope.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

error.description: Error response indicates Azure Resource Manager is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

ServicesHubRecommendationContentResultPr.description: Defines the content of Assessment recommendations

ServicesHubRecommendationContentProperti.description: Services Hub Recommendation Content Payload Properties

ServicesHubEnableSolutionProperties.description: Services Hub Enable Solution Payload Properties

token.description: Log Analytics Workspace AAD token for Orchestration Azure function

machineType.description: Type of Connected Machine - ARC or VM.

fileLocation.description: File Location for DCR to pick logs from.

MachineType.description: Type of Connected Machine - ARC or VM.

ServicesHubAssessmentConfigResultPropert.description: Defines the content of Assessment recommendations.

AssessmentModel.description: Properties of Assessment we wish to install.

assessmentName.description: Assessment Name which we want to install.

ServicesHubGetSolutionStatusPayload.description: Services Hub Get Solution Status Payload

properties.description: Services Hub Get Solution Status Properties

ServicesHubGetSolutionStatusPayloadPrope.description: Services Hub Get AMA Solution Status Payload Properties

ServicesHubAMASolutionStatusResultProper.description: Defines the AMA Solution Get Status

instanceId.description: Instance Id of Get AMA status API from Azure table.

status.description: Status of Get AMA Status API call in Azure Function.

activity.description: Process Name from Get AMA Status API call in Azure Function

errorMessage.description: Error Message from Get AMA Status API call in Azure Function.

ServicesHubEnableAMASolutionResult.description: Services Hub Enable AMA Solution Result.

properties.description: Services Hub Enable AMA Solution Properties.

ServicesHubEnableAMASolutionResultProper.description: Defines the Enable AMA solution properties

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of Engage Hub Spaces, if there are any.

spaceName.description: Name of the Engage hub Space.

id.description: Id of the Engage Hub Space.

targetScope.description: Target Scope is the unique identifier for the EngageHub Space.For example: user-hubid:4a89cd33-1fb6-5a21-b460-a9bfb292bf71

timestamp.description: TimeStamp when the connector is created/updated with the SpaceId.

spaceId.description: SpacesId linked to the connector.Example: West Joyce and Sons

logAnalyticsWorkspaces.description: List of LogAnalyticsWorkspaces linked to Connector and SpaceId.
List of LogAnalyticsWorkspaces linked to Connector and SpaceId.

assessmentCount.description: Count of Assessments mapped to the Connector resource.

LogAnalyticsWorkspaceForEngageHub.description: Properties of the Linked Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

omsWorkspaceName.description: Name of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

omsWorkspaceId.description: ID of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

location.description: Region where the Azure Log Analytics Workspace is deployed.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID in which Azure Log Analytics Workspace is present.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription ID where the Azure Log Analytics Workspace is present.

resourceGroupName.description: Resource Group Name of the Azure Log Analytics Workspace.

linkedDate.description: DateTime when the Log Analytics workspace is linked to connector.

isLatest.description: Tracking the latest Log Analytics workspace linked to the connector.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Unique identifier of the Azure subscription. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: API version to be used with the HTTP request.
